src:
Na ljubljanski obvoznici trčil v betonski zid, rešila sta se sama
Zgodilo se je malce čez polnoč.
05 Nov 2019, 06:07 by P. K.
LJUBLJANA – Ob 0.06 je na ljubljanski obvoznici na razcepu Malence tovorno vozilo s prikolico trčilo v betonsko varovalno ograjo. Vozilo se je prevrnilo na bok in pričelo je iztekati gorivo. Voznik in sopotnik sta se iz vozila rešila sama. Za enega so morali poskrbeti reševalci NMP Ljubljana.Posredovali so gasilci GB Ljubljana in PGD Grosuplje, zavarovali kraj dogodka, preprečili iztekanje motornih tekočin, razlite tekočine posuli z vpojnimi sredstvi ter policiji nudili razsvetljavo pri ogledu kraja dogodka, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.
text:
He collided with a concrete wall on the Ljubljana bypass, and they saved themselves
It happened a little after midnight.
05 Nov 2019, 06:07 by P.K.
LJUBLJANA - At 0.06 on the Ljubljana bypass at the Malence junction, a truck with a trailer collided with a concrete guardrail. The vehicle overturned and fuel leaked. The driver and the passenger got out of the vehicle alone. One had to be handled by NMP Ljubljana rescuers. The firefighters of GB Ljubljana and PGD Grosuplje provided fire, secured the scene, prevented the leakage of motor fluids, spilled liquids with absorbent means, and provided police with lighting to view the scene, reports the Administration for Protection and Rescue.
